item.title: Building Read Models with EF Core Projections
item.description: You can't really argue against the importance of performance in any application. Even if the system is not time-critical, efficient and time-saving operations are cornerstones of the system. Data fetching is the primary step for improving the performance of most applications. If you use Entity Framework Core (EF Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/building-read-models-with-ef-core-projections/
